mapper.select: SELECT g.GROUP_NO, g.GROUPNAME, g.STATUS, u.USER_ID, u.USERNAME, u.EMAIL, TO_CHAR(m.ACCESS_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS ACCESS_DATE_STR, r.ROLE_NO, r.ROLE_NAME FROM GROUPS g LEFT JOIN MEMBERS m ON g.GROUP_NO = m.GROUP_NO LEFT JOIN USERS u ON m.USER_ID = u.USER_ID LEFT JOIN GROUP_ROLES gr ON g.GROUP_NO = gr.GROUP_NO LEFT JOIN ROLES r ON gr.ROLE_NO = r.ROLE_NO WHERE g.GROUP_NO = #{groupNo} ORDER BY m.ACCESS_DATE DESC, r.ROLE_NO ASC

SELECT USER_ID, USERNAME, EMAIL, STATUS FROM USERS u WHERE (USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR USERNAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM MEMBERS m WHERE m.USER_ID = u.USER_ID AND m.GROUP_NO = #{groupNo} ) AND u.STATUS != 190 ORDER BY USERNAME ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERS (USER_ID, GROUP_NO, ACCESS_DATE) VALUES (#{userId}, #{groupNo}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MEMBERS WHERE GROUP_NO = #{groupNo} AND USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GROUP_ROLES (ROLE_NO, GROUP_NO, CREATE_AT, UPDATE_AT) VALUES (#{roleNo}, #{groupNo}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GROUP_ROLES WHERE GROUP_NO = #{groupNo} AND ROLE_NO = #{roleNo}
